bill_title: create a South Dakota Federal Stimulus Fund Commission.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to create a South Dakota Federal Stimulus Fund Commission. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby created the South Dakota Federal Stimulus Fund Commission to receive and distribute any funds that the State of South Dakota receives as part of a federal stimulus package. Section 2. The commission shall consists of at least eight members appointed as follows: (1) Two members of the House of Representatives, including one member of each political party, appointed by the speaker of the House of Representatives; (2) Two members of the Senate, including one member of each political party, appointed by the president pro tempore of the Senate; (3) Two members of the public higher education community in South Dakota, including one member appointed by the speaker of the House of Representatives and one member appointed by the president pro tempore of the Senate; and (4) Two members of the public elementary and secondary school community in South Dakota, including one member appointed by the speaker of the House of Representatives and one member appointed by the president pro tempore of the Senate.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
